name: Lorenzo Caproni

last_movies.title: 男性目光：一闪即逝的回眸

introduction: Born in Rovereto, Italy, March 31, 1988. At age of 14 he made his first short film. Since then he began a journey that allows him to deepen his passion for cinema. He attended the Art Institute "Depero" in Rovereto (address graphics, photography and cinematography) and graduated in 2007. Then Lorenzo takes part at the workshop "Making Movies" directed by Marco Bellocchio. From 2007 to 2011 he attended the faculty DAMS (Discipline Arts Music Entertainment), University of Bologna. From 2012 to 2014 he studied directing at the Centro Sperimentale di Cinematografia in Rome (National School of Cinema) under the direction of Daniele Luchetti.Since 2002 he has made over 10 short films (The Den, Lazarus come out, The place among us, 10 years etc).
